content: be sure to check out our youtube tutorial for this pattern https //youtu be/byifrnjb5i8 errata fins/horn portion of pattern have been added back in after the last edit accidentally excluded them thank you for your patience language english skill level easy required skills starting the round with an magic_ring magic_ring work in the round continuous spirals increases with single_crochet decreases with single_crochet stitches chain slip_stitch single_crochet stuff parts with filling sew openings close sew parts together join parts materials soft smooth acrylic worsted weight yarn as well as felt measures 4 on average depending on how tight you crochet © codi hudnall all rights reserved you may use this pattern for personal use as gifts or for charity but you are not permitted to sell this pattern or the finished item for financial gain if you have any questions or problems regarding this pattern or you find any errors please feel free to email me at knitgrithelp@gmail com
